description:
When people in New York want results, they turn to Papcsy Janosov Roche. We are a local law firm that has earned national acclaim for our work. In fact, 90% of the clients we have helped have come to us through referrals from other professionals in the industry.

What We Do At Our Law Office

Because we have several attorneys on board, we have the necessary resources to handle some of the most complex cases that other law firms reject. We handle a wide range of cases related to three main practice areas:

• Personal injury: We are most well-known for our work in this area and have won millions of dollars in compensation for our clients. Consequently, our legal team is a proud million-dollar and multimillion-dollar advocate.
• Criminal defense: If you have been accused of a crime, our team is eager to help you protect your rights and clear your name. Case types we handle include drug charges, assault and sexual assault.
• Divorce: Whether the divorce is amicable or highly contested, we represent divorcing parties. We also represent minors caught in the crossfire of high-conflict cases.

Why Choose Papcsy Janosov Roche?

Serving clients in New York City and throughout Connecticut, our law office has earned dozens of five-star reviews from people just like you who decided to choose us above their other options. These reviews mention our commitment to advocating for their best interests as well as the respect and compassion we provide. Although we are unable to reverse the pain and suffering caused by a car accident or a doctor's negligence, we make it our priority to get clients the compensation they need to cover medical treatment, lost wages, trauma therapy and related future needs.
